tag_list: seo, sem, citygrid, bpublic, bpublic-com, citysearch, search-engine-optimization, pay-per-click
overview:
Brad is a partner and founder of bPUBLIC.com, a new marketing company geared to the needs of small-to-mid sized businesses. bPUBLIC.com offers CityGrid, SEO, SEM, as well as video optimization marketing.

He began Telebay.com in 2002 as a Master Agent for Z-Tel (now Trinsic) and quickly became a Top 5 Master Agent for Z-Tel and soon thereafter accomplished the same with other telecoms, such as 8x8.

He has experience building and managing large affiliate groups. During his time with Telebay, his salesforce consisted of over 25,000 affiliates.
